ranked_diseases.disease_name: Neurodevelopmental disorder with language delay and variable cognitive abnormalities
ranked_diseases.explanation: All three reference cases with similar phenotypes were diagnosed with this condition. Patient shares key features including delayed speech/language, ADHD, autistic behavior, and seizures.
Characterized by delayed speech, autistic behavior, seizures, and ADHD. The combination of neurodevelopmental features with seizures fits well.
Common cause of intellectual disability with autistic behavior, ADHD, seizures, and strabismus. Male patient fits X-linked pattern.
Features severe speech delay, seizures, strabismus, and behavioral issues. However, typical happy demeanor contrasts with reported depression.
Presents with severe speech delay, autistic behavior, seizures, and strabismus. Typically more severe than presented phenotype.
Features autistic behavior, speech delay, seizures, and strabismus. Often includes additional features not present in this patient.
Characterized by speech delay, autistic behavior, seizures, and ADHD. Behavioral phenotype matches well with patient presentation.
